name: Wilson Green
description: I believe a relationship should inspire, encourage, and support each other to be the best version of ourselves we can be in the Moment. A relationship needs to grow and change all the time. It’s when we stand toe to toe working through anything that comes up together… Oh well here goes. I’m an outgoing, sociable and thoughtful person and have various hobbies and interests.I think it’s important for people to have individual interests but I also think that many activities are more enjoyable if they’re shared, so it would be nice to meet someone who shares some of the same interests.I think, though, that however much information you put in this section, the important factor is that elusive ‘chemistry’,so I’m hopeful!I like learning new things, new language, …. I am creative, good with arts and crafts. I have decided that now is the right time to bite the bullet and start a new chapter of my life.
